name: ca-office-deployment
description: Deployment configuration for CA Office Automation System

scripts.build-all: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && npm run prepare-electron
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && npm install --production && npm run build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/ backend/dist/ frontend/build/ backend/node_modules/ frontend/node_modules/
scripts.setup-dev: npm run clean && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test-build: npm run build-all && cd backend && npm run electron
